title: 1913 University of Akron football team
text: The 1913 Akron football team represented the <a href="University%20of%20Akron">University of Akron</a>, formerly Buchtel College, in the <a href="1913%20college%20football%20season">1913 college football season</a>. The team was led by head coach <a href="Frank%20Haggerty">Frank Haggerty</a>, in his fourth season. Akron was outscored by their opponents by a total of 87–103.
